name: Escape from the Asylum (Tyraenon)
description:
Escape from the Asylum

The game is made for the GMTK GameJam 2 - 2018. Theme: GENRE, but you can’t MECHANIC.

Escape from the Asylum is puzzle-bullet-hell game where the player must escape cursed asylum without taking pills. You can't shoot or dodge! You can only stop the time of the bullets for a couple seconds. 

The game consists of 5 rage initiating levels. Good luck, thank your for your time  and rate the game!

Controls:

W/A/S/D - Arrows - Move
Space - Stop time
ESC - Exit 

Credits:
